heading: paws on the green
description: the event: Paws on the greenthe cause: The 16th Annual Ladies Invitational PAWS on the Green Golf Tournament, presented by AutoNation, was held at Grande Oaks Golf Club. The event raised $150,000 for the Humane Society of Broward County.
